channel.title: Shop help! (testcsape)
channel.description:
well i have a shop glitch in testscape. i go to shops i add a whip and make 1000x of it or just 1. when i try to log in.... the server wont work. it just keeps saying "lost connection' please wait.... and theres nuthin and when i speak it says- null: hi
or smthin please help and yes i did enter correctly!

he needs to set his classpath too lol

item.title: Shop help! (testcsape)
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Your compiler is screwed up. That’s why.

Nice Yugioh btw…lmao.

And this is wrong:

shop = 1 Varrock_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5 2552 20 4151 100 1040 100

I think I can fix it for you though.

Click HERE and type in “lern me sum jaba.”

Read full topic
